TopicTitle: Career mode: Evolve KSC in unison with thech tree

Articles.Content:
At the start of career mode you're being presented with a fully developed KSC. You've got a huge research center but nothing yet to research and several other buildings that are next to useless. A smaller, less exuberant KSC would suffice.

So here's the idea:

Why not evolve KSC in unison with the tech tree, add or expand buildings as you unlock certain key fields in science? The current research complex consists of at least 7 or 8 distinct buildings (counting those connected with the bridge as two). One for each tech tier. The same goes for a few other buildings. Until the third and/or forth tier is unlocked the Space Plane Hanger and runway are almost useless. The radar complex could be evolved from a single dish to the full complex and the north and south wings of the Astronaut complex could become later additions.

Seeing KSC grow from something small and simple to the pinacle of science and technology would add to a sense of achievement, of physical progress.

(Of course in sandbox mode the entire KSC should be there from the start.)
I am pretty sure that's the plan.

I sincerely hope so but I haven't seen/heard anything along those lines yet.

I love it.

Maybe even make the VAB grow between tiers. You don't need anyone this big when you're at tier0 anyway
They said during the .22 presentation/marathon, that they change the grid of the buildings, so they can easily add/remove building as the game advance.
